[
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the Redux store",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "BDD gherkin style",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "another feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: adam@email.com"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "yet another feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: aloha"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "OMG a feature!",
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: "
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checks": [
        {
          "feature": "imperative style",
          "whens": {},
          "thens": {}
        }
      ]
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "LoginSelector",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "something",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: bob"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: bob"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: foo"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: foo"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Set the email and check the email",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Set the email by initial state, then set the email normally, and then check some other stuff",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: secret"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: wade@rpc"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIs: secret"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsNot: idk"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't show an email error just because the email does not validate",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsNotAnEmailError: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Put some data in both fields to enable the submit button. Email does not need to be valid!",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: adam"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheSubmitButtonShouldBeEnabled: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't enable the submit button if password is blank",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: "
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheSubmitButtonShouldNotBeEnabled: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't enable the submit button if email is blank",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: "
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: something"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheSubmitButtonShouldNotBeEnabled: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't enable the submit button if you haven't entered a password",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheSubmitButtonShouldNotBeEnabled: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't enable the submit button if you haven't entered an email",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: something"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheSubmitButtonShouldNotBeEnabled: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Check for email validations only after you've pressed the submit button 1/2",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsNotAnEmailError: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheSubmitButtonShouldNotBeEnabled: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Check for email validations only after you've pressed the submit button 2/2",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: adam"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheLoginIsSubmitted: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsAnEmailError: undefined"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheSubmitButtonShouldBeEnabled: undefined"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "testing redux store + reselect selectors",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "Set the email and check the email",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Set the email by initial state, then set the email normally, and then check some other stuff",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsSetTo: secret"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsNot: wade@rpc"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIs: adam@email.com"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIs: secret"
            },
            {
              "name": "ThePasswordIsNot: idk"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Don't show an email error just because the email does not validate",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsNotAnEmailError: undefined"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "Do show an email error after submitting",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "TheEmailIsSetTo: adam"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheLoginIsSubmitted: undefined"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "ThereIsAnEmailError: undefined"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checks": []
    },
    "status": "pass"
  },
  {
    "test": {
      "name": "Testing the http server",
      "givens": [
        {
          "name": "a boringfeature",
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: some great status"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "a feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: hello"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "a feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: aloha"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: aloha"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "a feature",
          "whens": [],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 0"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "a feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 1"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 2"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 3"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "another feature",
          "whens": [
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: aloha"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 4"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToStatus: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "PostToAdd: 3"
            }
          ],
          "thens": [
            {
              "name": "TheStatusIs: hello"
            },
            {
              "name": "TheNumberIs: 7"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checks": [
        {
          "feature": "hello imperative style",
          "whens": {},
          "thens": {}
        },
        {
          "feature": "hello imperative style II",
          "whens": {},
          "thens": {}
        }
      ]
    },
    "status": "pass"
  }
]
